General.Name: Highwealth Construction Corp
General.Description: Highwealth Construction Corp., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development, construction, trading, sale, and rental of residential and commercial buildings in Taiwan. The company operates through three segments: Developing, Constructing, and Department Store. It provides real estate broker agency services; wholesales construction materials; and catering services, as well as operates and manages hotels, motels, and department stores. Highwealth Construction Corp. was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
